document.topic_text: 18 AM EDT Liquid Crystal on Silicon Market 2016-2020 Industry exmined by Syndicate Market Research Liquid crystal on silicon (LCoS) is a reflective active-matrix liquid-crystal display. It is commonly called as microdisplay technology using a liquid crystal layer on top of a silicon pixel controller backplane. It is also referred as a spatial light modulator. Liquid Crystal on Silicon was initially developed for the use of projection in televisions. But now, it is used for wide range of application such as near eye displays, structured illumination, optical pulse shaping and wavelength selective switching. LCoS is typically used in a number of industries like consumer electronics, entertainment, medical, military and defense, automation and others. Moreover, some advantages of LCoS microdisplay technology include high brightness, high efficiency, contrast, resolution and others. Three-panel and single-panel are the two main categories of Liquid crystal on silicon. Rising global focus on new technology superiority is a key driving factor of the liquid crystal on silicon market. Open technology platform, compatibility with a wide range of products are the another key factor for liquid crystal on silicon (LCoS) market. The rising demand for high resolution display is boost the growth of the global LCoS market. Additionally, consumer goods are the leading and fastest growing segment in this market. LCoS panel are increasingly use in head-mounted display (HMD) and head-up display (HUD). High cast in competing technologies is major restraints for Liquid crystal on silicon (LCoS) market. On the basis of product, liquid crystal on silicon market has been segmented into head-mounted display (HMD), head-up display (HUD) and projectors. Projector was leading product segments of the market. Projectors are used in educational and business purposes, home theatre systems. Key applications include in liquid crystal on silicon market such as aviation, consumer electronics, automotive, military and medical. Among the all application segment consumer electronics dominated the liquid crystal on silicon market closely followed by aviation. All the market distribution on products and application has been analyzed based on present and future trends and the market is estimated from 2014 to 2020. The report includes detailed competitive landscape of the global liquid crystal on silicon market and an analysis of Porter’s five forces model for the liquid crystal on silicon market has also been included. It includes company market share analysis, product portfolio of the major industry participants. The report provides detailed segmentation of the liquid crystal on silicon market based on product, application and region segment. Major regional segments analyzed in this study include North America, Europe, Asia Pacific, Latin America, and Middle East & Africa with its further bifurcation into major countries including U.S., Germany, France, UK, China, Japan, India, and Brazil. This segmentation includes demand for drill bits market based on individual products in all the regions and countries. Liquid crystal on silicon market was dominated by North America followed by Europe. The report covers detailed competitive outlook including company profiles of the key participants operating in the global market. Key players profiled in the report include Cannon Inc., JVC Kenwood Corporation, 3M, VC Kenwood Corporation, Holoeye Systems Inc., Syndiant Inc., Sony Corporation, LG Electronics, Himax Display Inc., and Pioneer Corporation.
